price: 3 dans le pays voisin. Mais après leur défaite, ils vaincront,
arabic: فِيٓ أَدۡنَى ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَهُم مِّنۢ بَعۡدِ غَلَبِهِمۡ سَيَغۡلِبُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: fī adnā al-arḍi wahum min baʿdi ghalabihim sayaghlibūna
